item.title: Jennifer add a quote by George Burns
item.description: "You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old." -- George Burns

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "Once you learn to read, you will be forever free." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description:
"What an astonishing thing a book is. It's a flat object made from a tree with flexible parts on which are imprinted lots of funny dark squiggles. But one glance at it and you're inside the mind of another person, maybe somebody dead for thousands of years. Across the millennia, an author is speaking clearly and silently inside your head, directly to you. Writing is perhaps the greatest of human inventions, binding together people who never knew each other, citizens of distant epochs. Books break the shackles of time. A book is proof that humans are capable of working magic."
[<i>Cosmos, Part 11: The Persistence of Memory</i> (1980)]" -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "Whatever you're meant to do, do it now. The conditions are always impossible." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "You see things; you say, 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?" -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Katherine Mansfield
item.description: "The pleasure of all reading is doubled when one lives with another who shares the same books." -- Katherine Mansfield

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Anne Tyler
item.description: "I read so I can live more than one life in more than one place." -- Anne Tyler

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Walker Evans
item.description: "Stare, pry, listen, eavesdrop. Die knowing something. You are not here long." -- Walker Evans

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known." -- Carl Sagan
